meanings.definition: A group of people who operate and maintain an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The aircrew prepared the plane for takeoff.
meanings.sent2: During the flight, the aircrew ensured the safety of all passengers.
meanings.sent3: The aircrew accidentally spilled coffee on the pilot's seat!
meanings.sent4: The aircrew's teamwork was as smooth as a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The aircrew's dedication to their job was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The personnel who work on an aircraft during flight.
meanings.sent1: Every aircrew member has specific duties to perform.
meanings.sent2: The aircrew communicated effectively to coordinate their tasks.
meanings.sent3: One aircrew member told a funny joke to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent4: The aircrew's efficiency during the emergency landing was remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The aircrew's professionalism shone through in every action they took.
